Subject: Email alert
Description: Since the upgrade I have not been receiving emails from Netwrix Auditor i.e Stale users report and weak passwords.
Solution_Comment__c:
We reviewed the settings for the Notification in AIC and discovered that the mail server information was missing. We added the info and sent a test to your inbox, which was successfully delivered.

I reviewed the Weak Password job and noticed it pointed to the wrong host list. I changed the host list and pointed to the same host list as the ADI job.

We collaboratively reviewed the Report and added the exemption column that was missing.
Account_Name__c: Central Bank of Trinidad and Tobago
